Flow.description: To create entitlement from CLI and create, Update maintenance plan and work order. Developed for #SE-204,#SE-215,#SE-216

value.stringValue: AND( NOT( ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL( [ContractLineItem].Status , "Active" ), ISBLANK( [ContractLineItem].HRCSVC_Cancel_Date__c ), ISBLANK( [ContractLineItem].HRCSVC_Suspend_Date__c ), NOT(ISBLANK([ContractLineItem].ServiceContractId )) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_29
formulas.expression: AND( NOT( ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Status} , "Active" ), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.HRCSVC_Cancel_Date__c} ), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.HRCSVC_Suspend_Date__c} ), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.ServiceContractId} )) )
